extracted_text:
No significant corporate developments for ITC Ltd on August 27, 2025 . All major news on that date focused on general market commentary, stock price movements, and a stock market holiday in India.

On August 27, 2025, several publications discussed ITC's stock performance. Some noted that foreign institutional investors (FIIs) had been selling off their stake in the company for three consecutive quarters, and that the stock was trading near its 52-week low.

Other market commentary on that day noted that Indian stock markets were generally under pressure due to new U.S. tariffs on Indian goods.

Indian stock exchanges (BSE and NSE) were closed on August 27, 2025, in observance of Ganesh Chaturthi.
